QuestData.Title: Disrupting the Cycle
QuestData.Description:
The shacklers in the Tremaculum are an awful sort.
Souls are tortured there until they turn malevolent. They are then outfitted as guards so the cycle can continue.
If you wish to slow the rate at which the Jailer raises his armies, start at the source.
Disrupt the cycle at the Tremaculum.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat $1oa Mawsworn Shacklers and $2oa Deadeyes at the Tremaculum in The Maw.
